Detailed Description

SNMP Agent / SubAgent support for Asterisk.

Author:
Thorsten Lockert <tholo@voop.as>
ExtRef:
Uses the Net-SNMP libraries available at http://net-snmp.sourceforge.net/

Definition in file res_snmp.c.

00044 {
00045    struct ast_variable *var;
00046    struct ast_config *cfg;
00047    char *cat;
00048 
00049    res_snmp_enabled = 0;
00050    res_snmp_agentx_subagent = 1;
00051    cfg = ast_config_load("res_snmp.conf");
00052    if (!cfg) {
00053       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Could not load res_snmp.conf\n");
00054       return 0;
00055    }
00056    cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, NULL);
00057    while (cat) {
00058       var = ast_variable_browse(cfg, cat);
00059 
00060       if (strcasecmp(cat, "general") == 0) {
00061          while (var) {
00062             if (strcasecmp(var->name, "subagent") == 0) {
00063                if (ast_true(var->value))
00064                   res_snmp_agentx_subagent = 1;
00065                else if (ast_false(var->value))
00066                   res_snmp_agentx_subagent = 0;
00067                else {
00068                   ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Value '%s' does not evaluate to true or false.\n", var->value);
00069                   ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00070                   return 1;
00071                }
00072             } else if (strcasecmp(var->name, "enabled") == 0) {
00073                res_snmp_enabled = ast_true(var->value);
00074             } else {
00075                ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Unrecognized variable '%s' in category '%s'\n", var->name, cat);
00076                ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00077                return 1;
00078             }
00079             var = var->next;
00080          }
00081       } else {
00082          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Unrecognized category '%s'\n", cat);
00083          ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00084          return 1;
00085       }
00086 
00087       cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, cat);
00088    }
00089    ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00090    return 1;
00091 }
